meta.description:
蛋糕糊: See 12 enchantments, 4 hidden abilities. Offered by 17 merchants. Every 6.0 sec.: 获得20护盾 Passive: 使用工具时，高温或霜冻食物物品的护盾提高[+10/+20/+30]、生命再生量提高[+1/+2/+3]（限本场战斗）。 (BazaarDB automated finding: The tooltip says 'When you use a Tool' but the Shield buff triggers when ANY Tool on your board is used, while the Regen buff only triggers when an ADJACENT Tool is used. The Shield buff and Regen buff have inconsistent trigger conditions. 
 The tooltip says Food items gain the buffs, but the abilities actually target all items with Heated/Chilled attributes, not only Food items. Confirm with Deep Mechanics.) Patch 10.0.
